page.title: 12GLOSSOPDALE EMPLOYMENT (1)
page.content: Both our mothers leave for work at{ {7.30am.} Susan's mum works at{Lux Lux in Glossop.She catches a coach to work with the other people who work there. She makes{underwear}and works everyday except Saturday and Sunday, earning Â£80 a week. She has a break for dinner and a break in the afternoon for a cup of tea. She has a lot of friends at Lux Lux, and Susan's sister also works there. They catch the coach home at{ {5.30pm.} Anthony's mum works in a factory near{Simmondley called Hobroyd which is out in the country lanes. She winds cotton on to the reels and makes {ropes.}They made the ropes for the first{Mount Everest expedition. Anthony's mum gets a lift to work with another lady who works there. She arrives back home at about{5pm.}
